values:
so i got my progress report today.. i am not doing good right now to say the least is school! 

Got to bring my grades up soon!

Wish Candice and Madisyn would quit arguing about clothes! It is ruining a friendship whether yall see it or not. Candice just go to your dad's yall need to be away from each other for a while! 

I guess im going to call-in and go to that stupid play for bonus points!

School Rules suck... and we will not have to deal with them in 3 more months ...thank god!!!!

sorry bout the ticket and leyva brother(s) crikel!!
i love you lots!!

Ok...IM NOT GOING TO PROM...IT'S OFFICIAL!

i JUST WANNA BE LOVED

yeah i didnt go to school today..didnt feel like it..did yall miss me? 
Oh gah, last night we went to get Candice's prom dress..and we can to the school so i could get something out of my car and we saw Alex Streetman's car there.... as you may know  candice ants him to go to prom with her...she has never talked to the kid in her life..might i add! Anyways, i wrote him a note for her.... telling him not to be shy and call her...but he didnt   what a puss! ya'll have a great day at school...i miss yall!

and to david west: I ♥ YOU!!!!!!!!!

peace homie

i was scared for the whole month of January guys and girls! But today i started my period....that is exciting as hell and a big relief!!! But my stomach hurts so bad from cramps! I heard that if you get that shot of birth control that you never have cramps or a period again..does anybody know that for sure? Randy-lynn... im sorry about nikki! She gets out of control sometimes..hows your neck? I love you doll!!! Im not going to take sides though..cause i like you both! Ya'll will work things out sometime..i guess just try not to catch eye contact with her.... 
Madisyn..i miss you not being at school... GET WELL SOON! dumb ass doctors dont know what the hell they are doing! Madisyn has an infection ( HIV )...dont tell her i said it though!! lol..... Gah my tattoo itches so bad! Oh yeah and Seniors yall have fun at Prom..im not going to go..ive decided against it...but ill go to the after party just call me...
Ohh Ohhhh... I apologized to Tonya..who's proud of me? Cause i'm proud of me! I think tha it was stupid for me to still hate her over Chad Kennedy...he's hot, but that dont matter! So we are cool now! Anyways....i have no random comments anymore.... crystal...whats up chicka..i MISSSSSS you tOOOOOO! 

HOLLA

SATURDAY DURING THE DAY I AM GOING SHOPPIN AND THEN I HAVE A TATTOO APPOINTMENT AT 4:00. I AM GETTING THE LINES COMING OFF FROM MY BUTTERFLY AND THEN GETTING MY NOSE PIERCED..IM EXCITED!!!
CANDICE IS GOING WTH ME TO GET HER BELLY PIERCED..THEN I THINK THAT NIGHT I AM GOING TO WING'S BUT IM NOT FOR SURE..SO CALL ME IF YOU WANNA GO OR BE AT WINGS AROUND 6... IF YOUR GOING..CALL ME IF YOU WANT TO...396-7125
ARE WE READY TO GET OUT OF THIS SCHOOL OR WHAT?

so me and candice have come to the conclusion that sex ruins relationships! Once you have sex with the person you are dating... then they think they can have you whenever they want you and treat you how they want! Fuck that! I swear im practicing being abstanent..is that how you spell it? fuck VEY!!!!! fuck ROGER!!!!!
candice..lets just be gay...i guess thats what it come to?!?!?

Random Fact: if a man watches a woman undress in front of a window, he can be arrested as a peeping tom, if a woman watches a man undress in front of a window, she can have him arrested for indecent exposure. HAH!

I NEED A GUY....
THATS ALL THERE IS TO THAT!

OK..sATURDAY NIGHT ME AND CANDICE RICE AND BRANDI PEEKS ALL WENT TO SEE ONE OF MY FRIENDS...THEN LATER ON ME AND CANDICE WERE TRYING TO MAKE UP THE SHE IS STAYING WITH ME /IM STAYING WITH HER THING..THAT EVERYBODY HAS DONE AT ONE POINT IN TIME. SO WE GO TO SOUTHSIDE TO THIS JAZZ CLUB AND START DRINKING A LITTLE..THEN MY MOM CALLS MY CELL PHONE AND ASK WHERE I WAS. AT THIS TIME IT WAS 12PM AND I HAVE TO BE HOME AT 12:30. SO IM BASICALLY SCREWED AT THIS POINT. WE HAD TO TAKE WADES CAR TO HIS HOUSE IN HUEYTOWN AND THEN GET CANDICES CAR AND GO ALL THE WAY BACK TO MY HOUSE! SO...IM GROUNDED FOR 2WEEKS AND MY B-DAY IS IN 2 WEEKS. AND SHE MAY TRY TO GROUND ME ON MY b-day SO THAT I CANT GO OUT...SHES A BITCH IF SHE DOES THAT..CAUSE 18 IS SUPPOSES TO BE SPECIAL!! NOT TO MENTION THE GUY THAT I WAS TALKING TO SAID THAT WE SHOULD NOT BE TOGETHER ANYMORE/.....WHAT THE FUCK...AS OF RIGHT NOW IVE DECIDED I WANT A BOYFRIEND...END OF STORY!
oh..and i forgot to let everyone know that my birthday is coming up...JANUARY 22...and i will be 18...hell yeah!

yeah...its been a while since i've wriiten on here...whats up guys..glad to see that the drama in our lives have been dropped! Happy new years if i havent told you already! **** 2005**** to the class of 2005, we have what like 5 months left in our High School career.... are we ready to graduate though? You have to admitt HS has been fun while it lasted... all the drama..or the i fucked your girlfriend and or boyfriend..bullshit..it has given us all something to talk about...or life would be boring! We have searched to try to find out who we are..our likes and dislikes...and who we are as a person or friend. To all of my friends who have been there for me in a time of need i thank you for what you have given me! Im not gonna name names or anything..you know who you are! To the people who go by what others say about me..fuck you! Sorry it had to be said..i have deep respect for those who speak there minds!!! ok..i have to say this one person in particular...ALYNA WILLIAMS! I love you doll!! Jordan has been an okay experience for me so far... I really am ready to graduate though!  But you know what really sucks... besides the class of 2006 and 2007 going to miss us... is that i cannot graduate this year and get my diploma if i dont pass the history GRAD.exam!!! So yall pray that i do! I'm a dumbass for not being able to have already passed it! And i will be damned if i have went to HS for 12 years for a certificate of attendance! Hell NO!  Anyways I hope that this new year brings everybody happiness!! Have a good one! 


Much love to everybody!!

today...these are the people that i miss

micca
madisyn
laurabeth
micca 
madisyn
laurabeth

yeah thats all
I LOVE YOU GUYS!

LOVE ALWAYS
LEIGH ANNE

If we are friends...and you are getting me something for Christmas then post on here what it is that you want me, " Santa's little midget" to get you!

On another note, I sent Chad a christmas card..one of those 50 cent ones we buy at school...does anyone think that maybe i shouldn't have done that? Because i was thinking about it all day yesterday... and obviously i decided to do so...let me know what ya'll think about it?  It Said..." Hey Sweetheart...I Love You,I Miss You, and I want you to come back to me!" Is that gay? Nick Anderson helped me write it...so i wouldn't say anything unnecessary about Tonya in it, b/cause i prolly would have...i know its wrong to still despise her, but i cant help my-self!! And if you know me well enough then you know that i have a relationship problem! And i'm not real sure why it is that when i start getting serious with someone..all of the sudden it ends! So I told my mommy that i wanted to go to counceling for this..and so i'm going to start attending classes soon. Chad is the 2nd guy in my whole entire life that i have missed after i lost him. And it absolutely kills me when i see him and Tonya together. John B...with him it's the same way. Only like 3 of you know John B...and he was my 1st love..nothing is EVER going to replace him. Now he is a daddy...and i can not have him either...am I ugly? Am i too controlling or too selfish? If Chad were to tell me right now that he wanted a boyfriend/girlfriend relationship with me right now...i would NOT NOT NOT object. I have told my self over and over that I dont want a boyfriend...but in all actuallity i think that i do...one day i need to learn how to settle down...and not be so fuckin wild  and do stupid shit that I don't need to do! Chad.... gah i want you back soo freakin bad its ridiculous! To some of the people who think I am a bitch...I am..but if you think about it...what girl isn't at one point in time in their life...I'm not mean all the time... Just don't go by hear-say if you hear something about me....if you get to know me i really am pretty cool to hang out with! Crystal Lash..I am sorry for being mean to you..i respect you..and you don't need to take shit from anybody who talks shit to you..if i were you i would have cussed me out...but you would have had to put yourself in my position..you would see where i was coming from about the whole tonya thing. But really im sorry! Randi-Lynn....thank you for being honest w/me. I always seem to need a reality check.I never look at things from two differnt perspectives. ***SENIORS*** GOOD LUCK ON EXAMS...ONE MORE SEMESTER GUYS AND GIRLS! No more High Schhol Drama... just great memories...but what would it be without the drama...what would we talk about..lol?? I will miss you all.... Feel Free to post on here... Tell me what you think of me as a person... Truth hurts sometimes..but i need to hear peoples opinions!

OnE
Leigh Anne

1. MADISYN FALKNER
2. CANDICE RICE/MICCA GURLEY
3. TRUSSVILLE..I NEED IT IN MY LIFE
4. MY HAIR TO BE PLAYED WITH..BY APRIL CUNNINGHAM
5. PEANUT M&M'S
6. A LITTLE LAUGH..B/C DAVE WEST IS HILARIOUS
7. TONYA TO DIE
8. PARTY TO GO TO AND DRINK AND HAVE FUN
9. CLOTHES
10. EDUCATION

LOVE MUCH
ONE!

OK  SO I WENT TO TAKE THE ACT TEST SATURDAY MORNING AND IT SUCKED! IT WAS REALLY HARD..ESPECIALLY THE MATH PART OF IT...AND SCIENCE WAS NOT VERY EASY EITHER...IF THE SCIENCE PART WAS ANYTHING LIKE THE EXIT EXAM PART THEN MAYBE I WOULD HAVE SCORED HIGH ON IT...BUT ITS NOT! bUT I HOPE WHOEVER ELSE TOOK IT DID GOOD! DID YOU KNOW THAT NOW YOU HAVE TO HAVE LIKE A 16 OR 17 ON THE ACT TO GET INTO A JUNIOR COLLEGE LIKE WALLACE OR JEFF STATE? WELL YOU DO! 

ANYWAYS..NOTHING ELSE REALLY INTERESTING HAPPENED THIS WEEKEND SO THATS ALL!

I HATE TONYA!
lOVE yAlL,
LEIGH ANNE 

AIGHT ONE!

Okkk..so now and days who really like Stephen Foster? Post on here if you wanna hose him!! 
 
And Brett Woodward...pick and choose..which one is it gonna be? Crystal..April...Crystal..April? 

Madisyn  i miss you Good Luck on your test...you and Candice missed us wrapping presents in 1st block!

Micca and Crystal- thank you for my food guys..i love those cookies!

Alyna- thanks for the drink dog! It was the best 3sec. drink of my life!

Zack- i love it when people put ice down my pants!! I turns me on!!! J/K

Lucie- thank you for my shirt and earings you got me yesterday..or should i be thanking Icing?!?

Krikel- whats up dog!

april c- come play with my hair bitch!! i heart you!

This is our last Friday of the year 2004..did yall realize that? Everybody- GOOD LUCK ON YOUR EXAMS..I HOPE YOU ALL PASS THEM! AND AFTER SCHOOL WEDNSDAY..WE ARE GOING TO PARTY LIKE ITS 1999!! hELLS YEAH...I LOVE YOU ALL
MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

oNE
PS. I LOOKED AT MY CHRISTAMS PRESENT LASTNIGHT AND I AM GETTING A NEW CELL PHONE..THANK GOD!

Oh my god..i hate the rain so much!
It makes me want to fall asleep and i feel like drowsy! And the locker room was out of peanut m&m's which just makes things even worse...cause i am addicted...thats what i want for Christmas david...you promise? Alright...speaking of Christmas..i have absolutely no $ to give anybody anything....so sorry about that guys..you will get over it!  
alright  im about to go to sleep

OnE

This is for MIcca GUrley
Well..i wasnt trying to be short with you micca..the night after the parade! When i talked to you you were really short with me. But me and you have not really hung out with each other in the past forever. Remember when me and Chad first started talking and it was like me,you,chad,jake,dove,etc. Those days were fun! I miss them! Now it seems like you have some kind of attitude toward me now..im not real sure why though? I think you should stop holding whatever it is you have agaginst me and we should be good friends like we use to...cause its not the same..both you and me realize that..and so do a buch of other people. Thats all i hear.."Are you and Micca not friends anymore?" Alyna told me that you were talkin about me with crystal..which kinda bothers me coming from you! I just dont understand what happened there?  
You tell me?
Love,
la

We went to Candice's dad's this weekend..he is so funny! Candice you sleep here..leigh anne you can have my bed..george you can sleep with me in a sleeping bag! Candice..dont cry over him...if he dont do you right fuck him..there are more fish in the sea..trust me! Ive learned that lesson before and am in the process of doing it again! April...i love you...Remember this? " Yall know where my keys are...LEIGH ANNE..you know ...where are they..wheres my keys?" How was the Quest? You and Lucie have fun? Thank you madisyn for waking me up at 6 in the fuckin morning! Never again!! Saturday was the gardendale parade! Me and Kasie ended up jumping in Dove's truck and waving at the lil ones on the street...good times! Tonight we went to chill with Dee! He's my 3rd fav. black guy in the world! Oh i cant wait till i get my diamond earrings tomorrow at the mall! Thank you Ervay...your a doll!

okay... about all the bitching and arguing that has been going on lately sorry!.....yeah i was in a bad mood the last couple of days... even though i may not like Tonya..its okay cause she and chad are going to be happy together and they are good for each other..maybe she can keep him straight and out of trouble! 
Micca....
I am going to apologize to the people that i may have been a little mean to..not b/c i care if they hate me now or whatever but because i feel that i need to.
Crystal..
about all that bullshit...i just cant stand it when people get into my business and i thought that you were..i was very mean to you yesterday..and so im sorry about that!  Good Luck w/Jimmy!
David...
i dont think you have a big head on your shoulders...the girls like flock to you or something..its amazing! I love you..and im going to go ridin in the new car! one day!
Madisyn...
i just love you reguardless! aight ONE!
Candice...
i love that your so airheaded sometimes it gives us something to laugh about..dont change! i love you!

Maybe not all guys are complicated,but over 80% of them are! And girls...Girls are bitches! We all know that...every girl has their moment! And as for Tonya Holloway..hers was yesterday! you know i havent really liked tonya since i met her..i think that she is one of the most boring people to be with in the world! but if you are into that kinda thing go ahead!  Ask my main man David!! He will tell you! Chad please dont become stuck up like that bitch..and up her ass to where you cant hang out with your friends! You barely even do that now! but anyway...I think it is fucked up that you and me cant hang out with each other...but if thats what you wanna do go for it! i cant do anything about that!  Mad Dawg...what you think...you think i should be a bitch..or keep my cool! "What's she gonna do.....SHIT" I love you madisyn! and Candice...thank you for telling me i am prettier! that means a lot!! oh well what can ya do? Move on to bigger and better things...well maybe not bigger..lol!

love yall!
Alyna....what you think?
Bitch to Bitch!!
i love you alyna!

THIS THANKSGIVING HOLIDAY I WAS WITH MAD DAWG FOR THE FIRST PART..I SWEAR WE DRANK EVERYDAY..STARTING MONDAY...THURSDAY NIGHT I WENT TO THE MALL WITH TAMARA AND THE FREAKIN BUTT CRACK OF DAWN AND GOT HOME 2:30. THE NEXT DAY I WOKE UP AND HAD TO PACK FOR TENNESSEE....FOR REAL FOR REAL..OH I LOVE THIS GUY NAMED DEE! HE IS FUNNY AS SHIT..OH AND HE TAUGHT MAD DAWG HOW TO DANCE AND THROW UP GANG SYMBOLS!! HELLS YEAH... I SMOKE I DRANK...I SUPPOSED TO STOP BUT I CANT..IM A DOG...I LOVE HOES..AND IM ADDICTED TO $,CARS,AND CLOTHES!! TENNESSEE WAS A LOT OF FUN....SYKE...NOT FOR REAL. HOW BOUT...MAD DAWG IS ENGAGED! WHAT THE FUCK....JUST KIDDING IM HAPPY FOR THE BOTH OF YOU! ME AND T3 BOTH ARE. DAVID..TAHOES ARE BAD ASS FUCKIN BITCHES! CONGRATS ON YOU AND MORGAN..IM HAPPY FOR YOU! APRIL..YOU AIGHT MAN..YOU OVER THERE CHOKIN AND COUGHING UP LUNGS AND WHAT NOT! I HATE TABS BY THE WAY! 
DONT YOU HATE IT WHEN YOU GET SICK OF SOMEONE..AND YOU DONT KNOW HOW TO TELL THEM! SOMETIMES PEOPLE LIKE YOU A LOT MORE THAN YOU LIKE THEM....OK IM DONE!

LOVE YA

WHATS UP!  SO WE ARE OUT OF SCHOOL TUESDAY..HELL YEAH..THIS MORNING THO I DID NOT WANT TO WAKE UP AND GET OUT OF MY BED..IT WAS SOO FREAKIN COMFORTABLE! SO WHAT ABOUT AUBURN WINNING...? OK MY FELLOW ALABAMIAN FRIENDS...WE WERE DOING GOOD THE FIRST 2 QUARTERS..THEN AUBURN CAME BACK AND BEAT OUR ASS! BUT THEY ARE DOING GOOD THIS YEAR AND I SUPPORT THEM! MAD DAWG...I WILL SEE YOU TUESDAY...PARTY NIGHT..IM EXCITED..BUT ITS GONNA RAIN AND THAT SUCKS BALLS! MY HAIR IS GOING TO BE AN AFRO! COKE 45 AND TWO ZIG ZAGS BABY THATS ALL WE NEED....WE CAN GO TO THE PARK AFTER DARK AND SMOKE THAT TUMBLE WEED..... CANDICE..YOU ARE NOT THE D.D. THIS WEEKEND..WE CAN MAKE THAT A POINT  IF YOU NEED ME TO BE I WILL BUT I DONT WANNA BE EITHER....BUT I ALSO DONT WANNA HOOK UP WITH SOME UGLY RANDOM GUY....! LOL....LETS GO TO LITTLE CEAZERS AGAIN..AND THIS TIME WE CAN GET 2 BAGS AND YOUR SAUCE CANDI!!!THE STORY OF MY LIFE " IM OUT OF GAS A FUCKIN GIN!" DUDE I CANT KEEP GAS..IT EATS IT LIKE APRIL CUNNINGHAM DOES MY PUSS! EWW...WAS THAT GAY APRIL.? CAN YOU KEEP UP? BABY GIRL?  ANYWAYS IM OUT LIKE A FAT ASS IN DODGEBALL! 
I LOVE YOU ALL..
HOLLA ATCHA GIRL
PEACE OUT!

Ok...so the last few days my ex-boyfriend has been calling me and giving me hell about us breaking up and it being all my fault which it was but still...thats beside the point. I broke it off b/c i was sick of feeling like i was tied down to just one person. It is not easy breaking up with someone you really like and someone you have been with for awhile. A little girl by the name of Alyna Williams told me this yesterday.... and now i see how it is for erin hughes..although roy is not very good for her..but i kinda understand...kinda?? anyways...oh and im sick of everybody saying well we could hang out if you were not with Chad! Im not with him...thats the reason i broke up with the old guy is b/c i wanna be single and date other people... so all of the guys that think chad is going to be mad...GET OVER IT!!!!! IS chad my fuckin daddy now..NO! i have a dad...thanks!
love ya,
leigh anne

Last night we went to Hooter's and it was freakin packed out the wazoo. Farmer rode there with me and i drank 3 drinks on the way... so i was kinda feeling it while we were there. But it was fun to me while it lasted. Then we finally left and farmer drove back to G.Dale. I dont advise anybody to ever let him drive your car cause i can drive better than him fucked up as hell! i still love you though farmey! So then we get back to the school and drank some more there. I bought 2 packs of cigarretts and now i have like 5 left..that's re- damn diculous!I really wanted to make out with this guy but it didnt happen...that sucks!! oh well, maybe later...maybe??? I ended up driving home later that night and Micca spent the night with me. I had the worst hang over the next day. I woke up at 4 in the morning with a headache from hell. And all we have to drink in this damn house is milk. We are some broke bastards. Later on we went to Dave's house to watch them play **Halo2** then he left with his bitch and then me and randi-lynn went to eat. Aww dossy was ova there too. I miss Doss i wish that all this shit would blow over so he can start hanging out again..anyways im gone!

love ya,
leigh anne

Hey guys,
Oh before i forget i have to say hello to Chadmothafuckingray! Even though you may wish death upon me sometimes i know deep down that you love me! Hey Jarad!!! and Nick Thomas!!
 Anyways, oh speaking of school...we are out of here on Thursday, thank god! Tonight we are going to Hooter's to eat and D.w. is going to be my D.D....and if were not for him i may die tonight! Thank you doll..i'll eat your "taint" anyday!
Oh, and nobody come to school Friday either..its too over-rated and makes no sense that we have to come.. and we can party at Mr. Zackary Whitney's house.. he just dont know it yet. April Le'Shea you are crazy chicka and you look hoTT today!! oh yeah! Sullivan tonight don't do anything you will regret or get in trouble for! Laura.. I LOVE YOU! You need to hang out with me more. Micca...thursday..you know what we need? Yeah hook it up! ok bye.....skeet!!!!

Hello.. Im at zack's right now while he is cleaning his toilet...thank god! His bathroom was gross and filled with crude and such. We had a fun filled trip to Wal-Mart tonight to get some Lysol and cleaning supplies and Micca's picture.oh and Zack passed gas in there and it smelled like rotten eggs or something..so gross! anyways that was basically my night..i'm bout to go now..zack i love you dude!

ok well this guy that im dating now is really funny and everything but i really don't think it is possible for me to ever fall in love. In my past few relationships i have tried to and it just doesn't work.. maybe it was because he may not have been the one? who knows..? But to all of you who may know a guy that i am obsessed with (john b). i think he damaged my love life forever. BASTARD! i keep telling myself over and over that i hate him and i wish he was out of my head for good,but in all actuality i don't. im not real sure why i like him so much.. he wasnt my first or anything.. and i cant really figure it out? ever since i met him i have not yet forgotten him. dont get me wrong i love chad 2 to death, not to the point that i may fall in love with him though.. i dont see things going that way. we are so different its weird. maybe opposites attract..well obviously! Speaking of relationships..they are so over-rated!!! The reason that i dont want a guy is b/c 1. i hate being tied down. 2. i dont like somebody keeping track of where i am every second of the day..thats why i have parents. 3. when i turn 18, im going clubbin and im going to have fun with my friends. anyways im gone thats all i have to say for now, yall have a good day!!

love ya........
leigh anne

OK, WELL TODAY I HAD TO GO TO WORK AND IT SUCKED BALLS BY THE WAY! I HAD TO GO IN AT 10:00 AND STAY TILL 4. WE WERENT EVEN OPEN FOR AN HOUR AND HAD A PARTY OF 30 COME IN. AND I WAS THERE ALL DAY BY MYSELF. I SWEAR I THINK I SHOULD GET A RAISE! ANYWAY IT WAS ON MY MIND SO I THOUGHT I WOULD WRITE IT DOWN. HEY CHADDY...LOVE YA HUN. I LOVE MICCA GURLEY!!!!

This morning in the gym was our last high school pep rally forever. We actually got to do blacklight things today too. Althought it lasted about 5 seconds it wasn't too bad.And the game is tonight,so we better win! I feel sorry for the Senior football players, esp. after the game is over tonight! They want everyone to come on the football field with them tonight, so it should be a sad moment in life. DAVID H... I LOVE YOU MAN!AND FARMY, I LOVE YOU TOO DOLL!
